***************************************
Implement an Ad Unit
***************************************

|    Once youâ€™ve verified your integration with the Integration Helper, follow our integration guides and implement our Ad Units.
|    You can choose between :
|    - :ref:`optin-video`
|    - :ref:`interstitials`.
|

    If you are using a mediation and want to implement our ad units through them, you can follow our integration guides for :ref:`mediations`.
